trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were 3 other sightings in Phoenix on or around June 11th 2009
Summary: Bright white cross shape in western sky over Phoenix, Arizona.
divs: Sighting DetailsOn Thursday, June 11, 2009 approx. 8:00 PM my husband, myself and our neighbors saw a bright white light in the shape of a cross in the western sky over Phoenix. The top and bottom of this cross changed colors to red, blue and green. We thought it might be Venus as it was that bright. This was not a plane or helicopter as it did not move. There was no noise that we could hear. We watched if for approx. 25-30 minutes and it never moved. I called the radio station KFYI to report it to them and when I came in for my camera and returned the object was gone. We live in the San Tan Mountains and we have a very clear view of most of the valley. We are always watching the skies here. Respectfully submitted, Wendy L. Jones
